description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. Bludgeon, bomb, snipe, and slice your way through the undead horde as you go across the USA to save your loved ones and find a cure.  2 different endings, 7 cities, 12 weapons, and literally hundreds of different weapon combinations.
description.short: Bludgeon, bomb, snipe, and slice your way through the undead horde as you go across the USA to save your loved ones and find a cure.  2 different endings, 7 cities, 12 weapons, and literally hundreds of different weapon combinations.
